name: SmileySend
short: Have you ever wanted your bot to smile in every message? Now it can!
description: Have you ever wanted your bot to smile in every message? With this cog you can! It features with one command: `[p]smileysend` to make your bot send smiley in every message.
install_msg: Thanks for installing SmileySend. If you were already crazy enough to add this repo, I can just wish you great fun!
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
